summary: REQ-1 appears not implemented because no shared frontend config module (frontend/src/config.ts) is added in the diff, and immutable hook files were modified despite constraints. REQ-2 appears implemented in AdminDashboard by wiring in loginError and providing UI elements for errors/retry (based on diff text and file summary), but the hook immutability acceptance criterion is violated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure a `frontend/src/config.ts` module exists and exports `loadConfig()` (returning at least `{ ii_derivation_origin: string }`) and `createActorWithConfig(...)`, with safe defaults so Internet Identity identityProvider is not undefined/invalid at runtime.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any added `frontend/src/config.ts` (or `frontend/src/config/index.ts`) file, only a new `project_state.json`. Without the config module being present, the stated import `../config` may still be unresolved or incomplete. Also, there is no evidence that `createActorWithConfig(...)` was implemented.
evidence: project_state.json (only new file shown; no frontend/src/config.ts listed)
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts (imports `loadConfig` from '../config', but config module file is not shown as added)

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements/constraints and does not contribute directly to fixing Internet Identity login or UI error handling.

BuildRequest explicitly forbids editing files under frontend immutablePaths (notably `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts` and `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`). Any changes there are out of scope/violations rather than requested features.
